TEXT_DICT.TRANSLATOR NOTE: You can add a tooltip for any entry to help explain it by creating an entry named '<key>_tooltip'.
TEXT_DICT.relicCounters_tooltip: Hides the number on relics like #yPen #yNib and #yInk #yBottle [REMOVE_SPACE].
TEXT_DICT.enemyIntentDamageImg_tooltip: Randomizes the damage intent image of each enemy so you can't know their approximate damage.
TEXT_DICT.damageNumbers_tooltip: These are the numbers that fly off a creature whenever it loses HP or Block.
TEXT_DICT.enemyPowerAmount_tooltip: Hides the amount of each power enemies have along with all numbers in their descriptions.
TEXT_DICT.playerPowerAmount_tooltip: Hides the amount of each power you have along with all numbers in their descriptions.
TEXT_DICT.rewardGold_tooltip: Hides the amount of Gold received in combat rewards.
TEXT_DICT.eventOptionsEffect_tooltip: Hides the mechanical description of event options while keeping the flavor text.
